DEMO_412_MSG_010:
̂Hey, Mister, I haven't seen you around here before. 
...H-Huh? ...You're looking for Lucia?
DEMO_412_MSG_020: ̂I... know where Lucia went. B-B-But, she was...
DEMO_412_MSG_030:
̂Oh n-n-no... he's back! The King of Torture, Itaburu! 
Hurry up, we've gotta hide right now!
DEMO_412_MSG_040:
́Bring me the daily sacrifice, you maggots! 
Hurry up, or it'll end up bein' the whole lotta you!
DEMO_412_MSG_050:
́U-U-Understood, Sir! W-W-We'll bring out the s-s-sacrifice, 
just as you've r-r-requested, Sir!
DEMO_412_MSG_060:
́Good! That's wise of you. So long as you never oppose me, you all shall live to see another day.
ā
DEMO_412_MSG_070:
́Now, as usual, place the sacrifice within this box,
and don't make me ask again!
DEMO_412_MSG_080:
̂Mister, just a while back... Lucia gave herself up and
got in that box. We haven't seen her since...
DEMO_412_MSG_100:
̂However, I'm still in line as the next sacrifice, even 
though Lucia saved me the last time...
DEMO_412_MSG_090:
̂I was supposed to be the sacrifice that day, but she 
sacrificed herself to save me...
ā
DEMO_412_MSG_110:
̂Hey, Mister... Do you think there's any way we
can put a stop to this?
